title: Camo app now lets you use iPhone as your Mac webcam with FaceTime, Safari, and QuickTime
content:
Reincubate launched its Camo app back in 2020 to seamlessly upgrade your Mac’s webcam with the iPhone you already have. Over the last two years, the app has been continuously upgraded, and today brings a major milestone. Camo now has official support to use your iPhone as the webcam in FaceTime, Safari, and QuickTime Mac apps.

more…

The post Camo app now lets you use iPhone as your Mac webcam with FaceTime, Safari, and QuickTime appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Camo app is out today with a great update that lets you use iPhone as your Mac's webcam inside of FaceTime and Safari.
